name.description: Name of the Fiori application. Usually derived from the `sap.app/id` field in the application's manifest.json.

appPath.description: Absolute path to the Fiori application's root directory.

projectPath.description: Absolute path to the root directory of the project containing this Fiori application. For EDMXBackend (standalone) projects, this is the same as `appPath`. For CAP projects, this points to the CAP project root, which may contain multiple Fiori applications.

projectType.description: Type of project the application belongs to.

oDataVersion.description: OData protocol version used by the application's main service.
